profile.name: Majid Askarifarsangi
profile.tagline: I build things for the web

about.description: I'm happy to have a digital chat or meet over a cup of coffee.I create responsive, user-friendly websites, focusing on modern web design and effective web development, helping your business succeed online.

whatIsWebDev.title: What is Web Development?
whatIsWebDev.description: Web development is building applications, services, or sites that run over the web, whether that's consumer-facing websites or backend enterprise systems delivered through web technologies. It can range from creating simple informational pages to developing complex APIs and client-server systems that power entire organizations. At its core, web development is about using the web as the platform for delivering software and connecting people with the tools or information they need.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Frontend web development is about creating the part of a website or app that people directly use. It shapes how users see, click, type, and move through the interface. Ultimately, it bridges design and user experience into a functional product.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Backend web development is about building the logic, infrastructure, and systems that support a digital product. It handles how data is stored, processed, and shared between different parts of the application. Ultimately, it enables the product to function as an interconnected, intelligent system.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.description: For me, great engineering isn't just about code or metrics, it's about trust. When a client hands you a complex problem, they're trusting that you can deliver value. They rely on you not just to write solutions, but to understand their needs, anticipate risks, and communicate with clarity. Engineering, at its best, is a partnership, where every line of code reflects reliability, every decision reflects integrity, and every outcome strengthens that trust.

why.title: Why Your Business Needs Professional Web Development
paragraphs: Your website is often the first place people encounter your brand it's your digital storefront. In just a few seconds, visitors decide whether to stay and explore or click away. That's why design and usability are critical. A skilled web developer can craft a layout that captures attention and keeps users engaged.

One of the biggest benefits of working with a professional web developer is the chance to build a site that truly reflects your business. Unlike cookie-cutter website builders, custom development gives you freedom. Your website can align perfectly with your brand voice, whether you want something bold and creative or simple and minimalist.

support.title: Support and Maintenance
support.description: A website needs regular updates to stay secure and effective. Ongoing support ensures your site runs smoothly and grows with your business.

ux.title: Improved User Experience
ux.description: Easy navigation, fast loading, and clear design keep visitors engaged and more likely to convert into customers.

responsive.title: Responsiveness
responsive.description: A responsive site adapts to any device, giving users a smooth experience on mobile, tablet, or desktop.

cta.title: Ready to Build Something Amazing?
cta.description: A professional website is essential to the success of your business in today's digital world. Whether you need a simple website, e-commerce platform, or a custom web solution

story.title: My Story
paragraphs: I'm an experienced full-stack developer with over 15 years of professional work, specializing in React.js, Next.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. I've delivered solutions ranging from business websites to complex web applications for companies such as Konsulenthus Oslo, TechPros Oslo, and Osloweb Sandvika.
My passion lies in building performant, user-friendly applications that not only look great but also solve real-world business problems and strengthen digital presence.

I approach both work and life with a growth mindset, leading by example in both professional settings and at home. I believe that continuous learning and accountability are the keys to long-term success.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.quote: Technology evolves quickly, and the best way to stay valuable is through continuous learning, reinvention, and adaptability.

universities.description: Advanced studies in strategic business management, focusing on organizational development and strategic planning methodologies.
Comprehensive foundation in computer science principles, software engineering, and system architecture design.

career.title: Career
career.description: Over the years, I've enjoyed creating software, working on freelance projects, and full time positions as a web developer, always looking for new opportunities to grow.

experiences.description: AI training, problem-solving, prompt engineering using React, JavaScript, CSS, Tailwind
Built AI training pipelines, implemented prompt engineering solutions, developed AI model training interfaces
Led digitization project coordination, managed municipal IT infrastructure modernization
Developed automation framework for financial collections, built React dashboard with Node.js/PostgreSQL
Built large-scale digital platforms serving 50,000+ daily users, improved public service accessibility by 60%

intro.headline: Ready to discuss your project?
intro.description: Let's schedule a meeting to explore how we can work together.

hero.title: Who is a Web Developer?
hero.subtitle: A web developer is the person who builds the digital layer of today’s world. They turn ideas into websites, apps, and online tools that people use every day.

what.title: What Does a Web Developer Do?
what.description: A web developer creates websites and applications that run on the internet. Some focus on what you see and use, others focus on what happens in the background—but together, they make the web work.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: Frontend developers work on the interface. They make sure everything looks right, loads fast, and reacts when you click or type.

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: Backend developers work on the hidden logic. They handle data, security, servers, and everything that makes the system run reliably.

skills.title: Skills That Shape a Web Developer
skills.description: A good developer doesn’t just know code—they understand how people use the web and how businesses grow online.

items.title: Problem Solving
items.description: Breaking down complex issues and finding working solutions.

items.title: Design Awareness
items.description: Knowing how design choices affect usability and flow.

items.title: Technical Adaptability
items.description: Staying current with frameworks, languages, and web standards.

items.title: Collaboration
items.description: Working with designers, clients, and other developers to bring ideas to life.

items.title: Performance Mindset
items.description: Optimizing for speed, security, and scalability.

items.title: User Focus
items.description: Always building with the end-user’s experience in mind.

why.title: Why Web Developers Matter
paragraphs: Every brand needs a digital presence. Without a website or app, you’re invisible to most of your audience.
A skilled web developer helps create tools that don’t just exist—they perform. That means better reach, more engagement, and stronger trust.

points.title: First Impressions
points.description: A visitor’s opinion forms in seconds. Good development keeps them engaged.

points.title: Scalability
points.description: A strong foundation allows your site or app to grow with your business.

points.title: Reliability
points.description: Secure, stable, and well-maintained systems prevent downtime and protect your data.
